name: Spoof
description:
Made In two days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

An interesting  top-down , grid-based, puzzle experience with 9 unique levels that is based around the idea of "spoofs" - or imitations of yourself being obstacles and tools to reach the goal.

Audio Issues with Web build-

After a few levels, you may start to experience odd popping or static. To fix this, simply refresh the page, and you can continue from the level you were on by using the level select from the menu
